import React from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useCart } from '../context/CartContext'; const CartPage = () => { const { cartItems, removeFromCart, updateQuantity, getCartTotal, clearCart } = useCart(); const navigate = useNavigate(); if (cartItems.length === 0) { return (
🛒

Your cart is empty

Looks like you haven't added anything to your cart yet

Continue Shopping
); } return (

Shopping Cart

{cartItems.map(item => (

{item.name}

{item.category}

${item.price}
{item.quantity}
${(item.price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}
))}

Order Summary

Subtotal: ${getCartTotal().toFixed(2)}
Shipping: $5.99
Tax: ${(getCartTotal() * 0.08).toFixed(2)}
Total: ${(getCartTotal() + 5.99 + (getCartTotal() * 0.08)).toFixed(2)}
Continue Shopping
); }; export default CartPage;
